    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.98999977, 0.693147182
    def c5, 0.693147182, 1, -1, 0.999000013
    def c6, 1, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git CRC32_9CE4BFC5_0.txt

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git CRC32_9CE4BFC5_0.txt
texldl r6, c220.z, s13
mov r5, v0
add r6.w, r5.w, -r6.y
mad r5.x, r6.w, r6.x, r5.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r5.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r5.x
      mov r1.yz, r5.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    add r0.y, c4.z, r5.z
    add r0.z, r0.y, c8.x
    log r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, c8.y
    mov r0.w, c4.w
    mad r0.w, r0.z, r0.w, c8.z
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c8.x
    mad r0.z, r0.z, -c5.x, c5.y
    add r0.z, r0.z, -c8.z
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, r0.w
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r0.z
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    add r0.y, r0.y, c5.z
    dp2add r2.x, c8.w, r0.y, r5.x
    mov r2.yz, r5.xyww
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r2, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    mov r0.y, c5.y
    add r0.x, r0.y, -c2.y
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r0.w
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, -c2.x
    rcp r0.z, r5.w
    mul r0.zw, r0.z, r5.xyxy
    mul r0.zw, r0.x, r0
    mul r1, r0.w, c18

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git CRC32_9CE4BFC5_0.txt

mad r0.z, -r6.w, r6.x, r0.z

    mad r1, c17, r0.z, r1
    mad r1, c19, r0.x, r1
    add r1, r1, c20
    rcp r0.x, r1.w
    min r2.z, r1.z, c5.w
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.x, c9
    mad r2.xyw, r3.xyzx, c6.xxzy, c6.yyzx
    texldp_pp r4, r2, s2
    mad r2.xyw, r3.zwzx, c6.xxzy, c6.yyzx
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.z, r3.x, r4.x
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.x, c10
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.z, r0.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.z, r0.z, r3.x
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r0.x, c11
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.z, r0.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.z, r0.z, r3.x

    mov_pp r2.xy, r3

    add_pp r0.z, r0.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r3, r2, s2

    mov_pp r2.xy, r3

    add_pp r0.z, r0.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.z, r0.z, r3.x

    mov_pp r2.xy, r3

    add_pp r0.z, r0.z, r4.x

    texldp r3, r2, s2

    add_pp r0.z, r0.z, r4.x

    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.z, r0.z, r3.x

    mov_pp r2.xy, r1
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.x, r0.z, r3.x

    texldp r1, r2, s2
    add_pp r0.x, r0.x, r1.x

    mad_pp r0.x, c0.x, r0.x, r0.y
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    rcp_pp oC0, r0.x
